info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...AREA OF THUNDERSTORMS WORKING INTO THE OLD BADGER BURN SCAR THROUGH 430 PM... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms extending from 10 miles northeast of Rogerson to 7 miles east of Jackpot, moving slowly northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to brief heavy rain, wind gusts to 30 mph, pea sized hail, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Moderate to heavy rain on the Badger Burn Scar may produced enhanced runoff and possibly flash flooding. Locations impacted include... Paul and the Badger Burn Scar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If recreating within the Badger Burn Scar stay out of washes below heavy showers.
